conclusion: Identify the refractive index and angle of incidence: Refractive index of the element, n = 4/3; Angle of incidence, alpha = 37 degrees

Calculate the angle of refraction using the formula theta = arcsin(n/n1), where n1 is the refractive index of the medium outside the element (air, n1 = 1). Substituting the given values: theta = arcsin(4/3) = arcsin(4/3), theta approximately 53.13 degrees
